summary: Get the authorised reseller brand list for the shop
description: Get the authorised reseller brand list for the shop.

request_examples.code:
<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, array(
  CURLOPT_URL => 'https://partner.shopeemobile.com/api/v2/merchant/get_merchant_info?access_token=access_token&merchant_id=merchant_id&partner_id=partner_id&sign=sign&timestamp=timestamp',
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => '',
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 0,
  CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION => true,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => 'GET',
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => array(
    'Content-Type: application/json'
  ),
));

$response = curl_exec($curl);

curl_close($curl);
echo $response;

schema.name: auth_time
schema.description: The timestamp when the merchant was authorized to the partner.

schema.name: expire_time
schema.description: Use this field to indicate the expiration date for merchant authorization.

schema.name: request_id
schema.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

schema.name: merchant_currency
schema.description: The three-digit code representing the currency unit used for the item in this merchant. If currency haven't been setting in CNSC/KRSC, it will be empty. China merchant support CNY and USD currently. Korea merchant support KRW and USD currently. Hong kong merchant support USD currently, will support HKD later.

schema.name: merchant_region
schema.description: Region of the merchant. Including KR, HK and CN.

schema.name: is_upgraded_cbsc
schema.description: Use this filed to indicate whether this merchant is upgraded to cbsc.

error_codes.message: There is no access_token in query.
There is no partner_id in query.
There is no sign in query.
The merchant id you provided is not found. Please check your merchant id.
